name: Show me the first 20 contacts in the CRM
description: Fetch a paginated list of contacts from FluentCRM.

name: Find all contacts matching "john"
description: Search contacts by name or email keyword.

name: Get full details for contact ID 123
description: Retrieve all fields for a single contact by their subscriber ID.

name: Look up the contact with email jane@example.com
description: Find a contact record using an exact email address.

name: Add a new contact: John Smith, john@acme.com, +1-555-0100
description: Create a new subscriber record in FluentCRM.

name: Update the phone number for contact 456 to +1-555-9999
description: Modify specific fields on an existing contact record.

name: Delete contact with ID 789 from the CRM
description: Permanently remove a subscriber record.

name: Show me all available tags
description: List every tag currently defined in FluentCRM.

name: Find all tags starting with "AW-"
description: Search tags by keyword prefix.

name: Create a new tag called "hot-lead"
description: Add a new tag to the FluentCRM tag library.

name: Delete tag ID 12
description: Remove a tag from FluentCRM permanently.

name: Assign tags 3 and 7 to contact 101
description: Attach one or more tags to a specific subscriber.

name: Remove tag 7 from contact 101
description: Detach a tag from a subscriber without deleting the tag.

name: List all contact lists in FluentCRM
description: Retrieve every subscriber list in the account.

name: Create a new list called "Newsletter - Q1 2026"
description: Add a new contact list for segmenting subscribers.

name: Delete list ID 5
description: Permanently remove a contact list.

name: Add contact 202 to lists 1 and 4
description: Subscribe a contact to one or more lists.

name: Remove contact 202 from list 4
description: Unsubscribe a contact from a specific list.

name: Show all email campaigns
description: Retrieve the full list of email campaigns in FluentCRM.

name: Search for campaigns containing "webinar"
description: Find campaigns by title keyword.

name: Create a new campaign: "Spring Sale" targeting list 2
description: Set up a new email campaign with a subject and recipient list.

name: Pause campaign ID 33
description: Temporarily halt sending for an active campaign.

name: Resume campaign ID 33
description: Restart a previously paused campaign.

name: Delete campaign ID 33
description: Permanently remove a campaign from FluentCRM.

name: List all email templates
description: Retrieve every saved email template in the account.

name: Create an HTML email template called "Welcome Email"
description: Add a new reusable email template with a subject and HTML body.
arguments:
[{"title": "Welcome Email", "subject": "Welcome to our community!", "body": "

Welcome!

We are glad to have you.

"}]

name: Show all automation funnels
description: List every automation workflow configured in FluentCRM.

name: Search automations for "follow-up"
description: Find automation funnels by name keyword.

name: Create a new automation triggered by tag_applied named "Post-Webinar Follow-up"
description: Build a new automation funnel with a defined trigger type.
arguments: [{"title": "Post-Webinar Follow-up", "trigger": "tag_applied", "description": "Follow up sequence after webinar tag is applied"}]

name: Show all registered webhooks
description: List all outbound webhooks configured in FluentCRM.

name: Create a webhook that fires when tag 3 is applied
description: Register a new webhook endpoint to receive FluentCRM events.

name: List all Smart Links
description: Retrieve all Smart Link records from FluentCRM.

name: Get details for Smart Link ID 9
description: Retrieve full details for a specific Smart Link.

name: Create a Smart Link for the webinar replay page that applies tag 5
description: Build a tracked Smart Link that applies a tag when clicked.

name: Update Smart Link 9 to point to a new URL
description: Modify an existing Smart Link's destination URL or tag actions.

name: Delete Smart Link ID 9
description: Remove a Smart Link from FluentCRM.

name: Generate a shortcode for Smart Link slug "webinar-replay"
description: Produce the FluentCRM shortcode embed string for a Smart Link.

name: Validate Smart Link data before creating it
description: Check that a Smart Link payload is valid before submitting it.

name: Show me the CRM dashboard statistics
description: Fetch high-level CRM metrics including subscriber counts and activity.

name: What custom fields are defined in FluentCRM?
description: Retrieve all custom field definitions available for contacts.
